metadata.title: Rockcloud Healing Crystals Gift Kit in Gift Box - 7 Chakra Set Tumbled Stones, Rock Quartz Energy Generator, Chara Bracelet & Pendulum for Meditation
features: 10 PCS HEALING CRYSTAL KIT-- We have carefully selected this variety of stones to be the perfect enhancement to any environment. Includes 7 chakra tumbled stones (Clear Quartz, Amethyst, Sodalite, Aventurine, Yellow Jade, Carnelian, and Red Jasper), Rock Quartz Generator, Chakra Bracelet & Pendulum.
SIZE DETAILS(APPROX)-- Chakra Stones: 0.6 - 0.8 inch, Generator: 3.5 - 3.6 inches; Bracelet: 7 inches; Pendulum: 0.55 x 1.8 inches, Chain:6.5 inches

MULTIPLY HEALING FUNCTION-- Ideal for use by vibrational healers, Reiki therapists and other energy workers. Ability to create a casual reality with others with a focused consciousness, effective in receiving information or create spaces of thought. Hold in your hand during meditation, stand on your desk while you work during the day or by your bedside at night to benefit from it's healing energy.

MEMORABLE GIFT-- Beautifully packaged and ready to give as a gift. Includes a white box and a cute rockcloud velvet bag (traditionally used to protect crystals from outside energies). Great for meditation, chakra healing, crystal gridding, yoga, reiki, spiritual practice, and/ or home decor.

ONE AND UNIQUE-- Since each crystal is struck from a different stone expect some slight color variations between each piece, and lot purchased. Like us humans they are imperfect in there perfect nature.
description: We carefully hand-select each crystal for its beauty and metaphysical qualities, ensuring that you are receiving the best stones available. Beautifully packaged and ready to give as a gift. Includes box and velvet bag! Please kindly note that each stone is natural, therefore you will receive one set little vary from picture shown. Hope you have good luck after using this set crystals kit!
